fields.name: columnCount
fields.description: The number of columns to use to lay out the fields

fields.name: columnOrder
fields.description: The order of the fields to use in the fields property to lay out the fields in a record

fields.name: fields
fields.description: The fields and values for the record contained in this

fields.name: heading
fields.description: A localized label to display when rendering this

fields.name: isCollapsible
fields.description: Indicates whether the section can be collapsed
